title: Oil Steadies as Traders Weigh Demand Impact from Winter Storm
description: Oil steadied as traders weighed the impact on demand from a sweeping US winter storm, which has led to disruptions at major refiners such as Exxon Mobil Corp. across the Texas coast.
content: Oil steadied as traders weighed the impact on demand from a sweeping US winter storm, which has led to disruptions at major refiners such as Exxon Mobil Corp. across the Texas coast.
